feed.title: IBM TRIRIGA Assistant
feed.subtitle: TRIRIGA Assistant is an AI chatbot powered by the IBM Watson Assistant Service. It offers a brand new experience for employees to engage with their workplace services. It allows employees to make room reservations, report issues or lookup people using natural language.

entry.title: Welcome to v1.04!
entry.content:
In this update we explore the possibilities of analytics with IBM TRIRIGA Assistant. With Version 1.0.4 we are introducing a new dashboard for TRIRIGA Administrators to help understand how the Assistant is being consumed by end users.

This new reporting dashboard helps visualize usage statistics like daily concurrent users, or satisfaction scores over the course of a month. We hope to expand this to even more exciting metrics in updates to come.

Examples

Monthly View:

Daily View:
entry.summary: In this update we explore the possibilities of analytics with IBM TRIRIGA Assistant. With Version 1.0.4 we are introducing a new dashboard for TRIRIGA Administrators to help understand how the Assistant is being consumed by end users.
